TopicTitle: Having issues with Near Future mods and similar

Articles.Content: Ive been trying to install all the Near Future mods, in addition to cryo rockets, kerbal atomics, and a few other mods by Nertea. With near future propulsion, engines show, but none of the fuel or fuel tanks that accompany. Some of them show while loading, but i can't find them at in the game. Please help
Going to need more information.  Please read this and provide the information it suggests.
